title: Some remarks on injective envelopes on ring extensions
abstract:
Let $f:S\rightarrow R$ be a ring extension. We introduce and study the
properties of $(R, S)_\star$-injective modules and the existences of $(R,
S)_\star$-injective envelopes. Besides, we show that every $R$-module has an
$(R, S)$-injective envelope when $S$ is a pure-semisimple ring.
